title: The Land of Desolation
description: Walls are destroyed. Shields are shattered. Strength wanes. The situation is grim and it's about to get worse. No one is safe. A Tale of Mist and Shadow picks up right where it left off in the aftermath of a great battle between the forces of Dione and the citizens of Enoch's Pardon. As the tale continues, follow the children as they endure brutal conditions and are forced into the depths of hell at the hands of their savage captors. Will they be rescued? The land of desolation is an unforgiving land of fire, deceit, and evil that will lay waste to all sanctuaries. Who will be consumed by its unquenchable flames? Will those that manage to survive ultimately be corrupted, scarred by their torture, enslaved forever by the darkness that surrounds them? Discover who, and what, will rise out of the ashes as you continue your journey through the mists and shadows and into the Land of Desolation. This book contains mature content.
author: M.R. Laver
